bio:
The First Mate is a corsair on the Dainty Sload, a pirate ship anchored near the Solitude Lighthouse.
He wields a steel dagger in combat. The captain's locked chest is next to him.
He holds the key to Captain Volf's footlocker. He, along with the rest of the corsairs, are offended by the player's presence on the ship and will attack them on sight.
name: First Mate
